name: quickstart-semantic-ranking-ts

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.create-index: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/createIndex.js
scripts.upload-docs: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/uploadDocuments.js
scripts.search-simple: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/searchSimple.js
scripts.search-bm25: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/searchBM25.js
scripts.search-semantic: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/searchSemantic.js
scripts.search-answers: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/searchSemanticAnswer.js
scripts.delete-index: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/deleteIndex.js

description: Azure AI Search semantic ranking quickstart in TypeScript
